verses.verse: Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> summoned <S%H7121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am speaking <S%H1696><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> in your hearing, <S%H241><s%> that you may learn <S%H3925><s%> them and observe <S%H8104><s%> them carefully. <S%H6213><s%>
"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with us at Horeb. <S%H2722><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> did not make <S%H3772><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with our fathers, but with us, [with] all <S%H1><s%> those <S%H3605><s%> of us alive <S%H428><s%> here <S%H2416><s%> today. <S%H6311><s%>
"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you face <S%H6440><s%> to face <S%H6440><s%> at the mountain <S%H2022><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%>

[while] I was standing <S%H5975><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and you at that time, <S%H6256><s%> to declare <S%H5046><s%> to you the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> for you were afraid <S%H3372><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%> and did not go <S%H5927><s%> up the mountain. <S%H2022><s%> He said, <S%H559><s%>

'I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of slavery. <S%H5650><s%>
'You shall have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Me.

'You shall not make <S%H6213><s%> for yourself an idol, <S%H6459><s%> [or] any <S%H3605><s%> likeness <S%H8544><s%> [of] what <S%H834><s%> is in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> or on the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> or in the water <S%H4325><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

'You shall not worship <S%H7812><s%> them or serve <S%H5647><s%> them; for I, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers on the children, <S%H1><s%> and on the third <S%H1121><s%> and the fourth <S%H8029><s%> [generations] of those who hate <S%H7256><s%> Me,
but showing <S%H6213><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> to thousands, <S%H505><s%> to those who love <S%H157><s%> Me and keep <S%H8104><s%> My commandments. <S%H4687><s%>

'You shall not take <S%H5375><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in vain, <S%H7723><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will not leave <S%H5352><s%> him unpunished <S%H5352><s%> who <S%H834><s%> takes <S%H5375><s%> His name <S%H8034><s%> in vain. <S%H7723><s%>
'Observe <S%H8104><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> to keep <S%H6942><s%> it holy, <S%H6942><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you.
'Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall labor <S%H5647><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your work, <S%H4399><s%>

but the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> [in it] you shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> work, <S%H4399><s%> you or your son <S%H1121><s%> or your daughter <S%H1323><s%> or your male <S%H5650><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> or your female <S%H519><s%> servant <S%H519><s%> or your ox <S%H7794><s%> or your donkey <S%H2543><s%> or any <S%H3605><s%> of your cattle <S%H929><s%> or your sojourner <S%H1616><s%> who <S%H834><s%> stays with you, so <S%H4616><s%> that your male <S%H5650><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> and your female <S%H519><s%> servant <S%H519><s%> may rest <S%H5117><s%> as well as you.

'And you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> that you were a slave <S%H5650><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of there <S%H8033><s%> by a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and by an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm; <S%H2220><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you to observe <S%H6213><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

'Honor <S%H3513><s%> your father and your mother, <S%H1><s%> as the Lord <S%H517><s%> your God <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H430><s%> you, that your days <S%H6680><s%> may be prolonged, <S%H3117><s%> and that it may go <S%H748><s%> well <S%H3190><s%> with you on the land <S%H3190><s%> which <S%H127><s%> the Lord <S%H834><s%> your God <S%H3068><s%> gives <S%H430><s%> you.
'You shall not murder. <S%H7523><s%>
'You shall not commit <S%H5003><s%> adultery. <S%H5003><s%>
'You shall not steal. <S%H1589><s%>
'You shall not bear <S%H6030><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against your neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>

'You shall not covet <S%H2530><s%> your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> and you shall not desire <S%H183><s%> your neighbor's house, <S%H1004><s%> his field <S%H7704><s%> or his male <S%H5650><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> or his female <S%H519><s%> servant, <S%H519><s%> his ox <S%H7794><s%> or his donkey <S%H2543><s%> or anything <S%H3605><s%> that belongs to your neighbor.'

"These <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> your assembly <S%H6951><s%> at the mountain <S%H2022><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%> [of] the cloud <S%H6051><s%> and [of] the thick <S%H6205><s%> gloom, <S%H6205><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> and He added <S%H3254><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H3254><s%> And He wrote <S%H3789><s%> them on two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them to me.

"And it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when you heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the darkness, <S%H2822><s%> while the mountain <S%H2022><s%> was burning <S%H1197><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> that you came <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to me, all <S%H3605><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of your tribes <S%H7626><s%> and your elders. <S%H2205><s%>

"And you said, <S%H559><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> has shown <S%H7200><s%> us His glory <S%H9202><s%> and His greatness, <S%H1433><s%> and we have heard <S%H8085><s%> His voice <S%H6963><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire; <S%H784><s%> we have seen <S%H7200><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> with man, <S%H120><s%> yet he lives. <S%H2421><s%>

'Now <S%H6258><s%> then why <S%H4100><s%> should we die <S%H4191><s%>? For this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> will consume <S%H398><s%> us; if <S%H518><s%> we hear <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> any <S%H5750><s%> longer, <S%H5750><s%> then we shall die. <S%H4191><s%>

'For who <S%H4310><s%> is there of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H430><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%> as we [have], and lived <S%H2421><s%>?

'Go <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> says; <S%H559><s%> then speak <S%H1696><s%> to us all <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> will speak <S%H1696><s%> to you, and we will hear <S%H8085><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> [it.]'

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your words <S%H1697><s%> when you spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me, and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have spoken <S%H1696><s%> to you. They have done <S%H3190><s%> well <S%H3190><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that they have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

'Oh <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> that they had <S%H1961><s%> such <S%H2088><s%> a heart <S%H3824><s%> in them, that they would fear <S%H3372><s%> Me, and keep <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> My commandments <S%H4687><s%> always, <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> that it may be well <S%H3190><s%> with them and with their sons <S%H1121><s%> forever! <S%H5769><s%>
'Go, <S%H1980><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to them, "Return <S%H7725><s%> to your tents. <S%H168><s%>"

'But as for you, stand <S%H5975><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> by Me, that I may speak <S%H1696><s%> to you all <S%H3605><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> and the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall teach <S%H3925><s%> them, that they may observe <S%H6213><s%> [them] in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I give <S%H5414><s%> them to possess. <S%H3423><s%>'

"So you shall observe <S%H6213><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you; you shall not turn <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> to the right <S%H3225><s%> or to the left. <S%H8040><s%>

"You shall walk <S%H1980><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, that you may live, <S%H2421><s%> and that it may be well <S%H2895><s%> with you, and that you may prolong <S%H748><s%> [your] days <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall possess. <S%H3423><s%>
